dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Good morning, Sam. Do you know where the project files are? I can't find them on my desk.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: They're in a small space within the kitchen. I left them on the table yesterday.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: The kitchen? That's an odd place for important documents.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: I know, I know. I was working late and needed some coffee. Don't forget to call the team in Paris tomorrow. The meeting is early, at eight in the morning.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Eight? That's very early for us here. What time is that in Paris?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Two in the afternoon for them. They suggested this time because everyone on their team can join.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I agree with that choice. We need everyone for this presentation. Did you finish the data analysis?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Not completely. I'm waiting for you to send me the cost information. I can't complete my part without it.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Wait here. I'll get my bag from the other room. The data is on my computer.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Actually, there's another problem. The main topic for tomorrow changed. They want us to cover the future targets now, not the current position.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: What? When did this occur? Why didn't they tell us earlier?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: I received the message an hour ago. It's a concern because we don't have all the information ready.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: This requires a lot of work. Can we manage to finish everything in time?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: We can do it, but we need to work through the day and maybe even tonight. Do you have the key data we need?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Some of it, yes. But certain information is with the team in America. They won't be awake for another two hours.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: That's not good. What are our options here?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Well, we can use the data from last month and make a copy with small changes. It's not completely different from now.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: That's a useful suggestion. I can work on that part. What will you do?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I'll call the lady from the Paris office. Her name is Marie. She always helps us when we have problems.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Good idea. She knows the project well and can surely answer our questions about the targets.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I'm calling her now. Wait here for a moment.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Take your time. I'll start working on the new pages.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: She answered! Marie agrees to help us. She'll send the information within the hour.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: That's wonderful! We can finish this now. Tomorrow's meeting will be good.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Yes. And next time, let's not forget to ask about changes earlier!
